meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7472.

td.p: Clarissa Santori, a senior at Northeastern University from Ellicott City, Maryland
Mohan Malhotra, a freshman at NYU from Wilmington, Delaware
Viraj Mehta, a junior at Stanford University from Austin, Texas

tr.td: THEY NAMED A SCHOOL FOR ME
FRENCH HISTORY
A LIQUID CATEGORY
PROVERBIAL VERBS
STATES BY COUNTIES

td.a: THE NEW YORK TIMES MOVIE REVIEWS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'In August 2015 3 retired Marines helped raise the U.S. flag in this city where they\'d hauled it down 54 years earlier')

tr.td: WORLD POLITICS
(Alex: The clue is very, very topical.)
In August 2015 3 retired Marines helped raise the U.S. flag in this city where they'd hauled it down 54 years earlier
Viraj
Mohan
Clarissa
Finalist
2nd place: $10,000
3rd place: $10,000
Viraj
Mohan
Clarissa

21 R,
4 W
(including 1 DD)

11 R
(including 2 DDs),
3 W
